titleStmt.title: HGB 1 2/96 S. [7]
titleStmt.sponsor: Departement of History, Faculty of Philosophy and History, University of Basel
Digital Humanities, Walter-Benjamin-Kolleg, University of Bern

publicationStmt.p: This file was created as part of the Economies of Space project by a team from the University of Basel and the University of Berne. Published in August of 2025.

seriesStmt.title: Manually annotated Ground Truth from the Historical Land Records of Basel.

listBibl.desc: This document is a digitalization of a register card which holds an excerpt from an original source document. The register-item element holds information pertaining to the register card while the source element names the original archive or corpus the excerpt was taken from. The date given under profileDesc/creation/date refers to the creation of the original document, the exact date of creation of the register item is unknown.

projectDesc.p: Manually annotated text for machine training and evaluation purposes in the project Economies of Space.

location.desc: Location of the main property the document is about.

body.ab: Hans von Pltingen mit willen Frantzen Eltingers zins vatter , ouch Angnes desselben Frantzen Ewirtin , verkauft an Peter Schützen den Rebman , daz Hus & Hofstatt mit dem garten derhinder , als es gelegen ist in der vorstatt ze Eschemerthor , ư genant zem Haffen , nebent der Brennerin hus genant zem trachen ze einer siten , u . Clewin Gottschis hus den man sprichet zem Widershom zer andern siten , zinset voneig . der Thumprobstye 11 becher Bonen , um 163 fl .
